hero.subtitle: 8+ years crafting scalable web & mobile experiences
hero.description: Ex-Microsoft contractor reaching 1B+ users • React, TypeScript & React Native specialist

about.title: About
about.p1: I build fast, user-loving apps and mobile experiences.

telescope.title: Frontend Team Lead Engineer
descriptions: Frontend Team Lead
Async request handling on frontend with Signal.
GPT Integration for data analysis and visualization.
Highcharts library for AI based data analysis and visualization.
Using signal for async request handling on frontend.
Develop and optimize frontend solutions, focusing on performance and user experience improvements.
Work closely with product teams to deliver innovative solutions for real-time data analytics and visualization.

microsoft.title: Frontend Engineer
descriptions: Building all community related UI components from zero for Microsoft News canvases (Edge, Windows 10 taskbar, Windows 11 widgets, msn.com etc.), including commenting, user/publisher profiles, tipping, subscription, and personalized notifications.
These experiences are now reaching across 53 markets and 1 billion monthly unique active users.
Led the development of:
Microsoft Tools AEC UI
Microsoft Views UI
Microsoft Community UI (Responsible for the development)
Microsoft Beacon UI
Microsoft Flyout UI
Conducted Visual Parity Test development and Unit Test development, ensuring consistent and reliable performance across platforms.

kod.title: Full Stack Developer & Mobile Developer
descriptions: Web, B2B, B2C
Web CRM and Mobile CRM development
Web and Mobile POS development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Web and Mobile Reporting development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Web and Mobile Inventory management development
Led the development of advanced B2C and B2B mobile applications, now widely used across hotels in Turkey.
Specialized in solving complex build and publish issues for iOS and Android platforms.

phoenix.title: Middle Software Engineer (Frontend Developer)
descriptions: Developed web applications focusing on performance optimizations and feature enhancements using modern JavaScript frameworks.

eveara.title: Middle Software Engineer (Frontend Developer)
descriptions: Worked on a variety of frontend projects, contributing to the overall code quality and product design.

medyat.title: Junior - Middle Software Engineer (Full Stack Developer)
descriptions: Gained foundational experience in full stack development, working on diverse projects from inception to deployment.

fatma.description: We work with the same team. Working with him on the same project is reassuring and wonderful. He is helpful, hardworking and has very strong communication. He is a teammate that everyone would want to work with. I wish him continued success. I hope everyone will have a teammate like him one day.

oguzhan.description: As the Head of Software Department, I had the opportunity to work closely with Yunus as our Frontend Developer. His mastery of modern frontend technologies and attention to UI/UX details consistently impressed both the team and our clients. Yunus has a unique ability to transform complex requirements into elegant, performant interfaces. His growth during his time with us was remarkable, and I have no doubt he will continue to excel in his career.

isfendiyar.description: Working alongside Yunus as the backend developer while he handled the frontend was an absolute joy. Our frontend-backend collaboration was seamless - he always understood the API requirements instantly and delivered pixel-perfect implementations. Beyond his technical skills, Yunus is genuinely a great person to work with. Coffee breaks, debugging sessions, and late-night deployments were always better with him around. Miss those days, brother!

mehmet.quote: A Great Addition From Day One
mehmet.description: I was the first person Yunus spoke with when he joined Kod Yazılım, and from that very first conversation, I knew we had found someone special. His enthusiasm, professionalism, and eagerness to contribute were evident right away. Throughout his time with us, Yunus proved that first impression right - he became a key member of our development team and earned the respect of everyone in the company. It was a pleasure to have him on board.

sarah.description: Professional, skilled, and always delivers on time. Yunus's work on our e-commerce platform exceeded all our expectations. Would definitely work with him again.

david.description: Rare combination of technical skills and creative vision. Yunus brought our design mockups to life with pixel-perfect precision and smooth animations.
